name: Verizon First Responders Discount
description: 25% off monthly Verizon Unlimited phone plans
fullDescription: Verizon offers ongoing monthly discounts on wireless plans for verified first responders including firefighters, police officers, EMTs, and paramedics.
whatTheyOffer:
- 25% off select Verizon Unlimited plans
- Monthly recurring discount
- Available for new and existing customers
- Stackable with device promotions
- Applies to phone, tablet, and watch lines
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Verizon store or website
2. Verify first responder status through ID.me
3. Provide department credentials
4. Discount applied to eligible plans
5. Renew verification annually
